title: Add wilcoxonSignedRank Stream Evaluator to support the  Wilcoxon Signed Rank Test
description:
This ticket will add the  Wilcoxon Signed Rank Test to the Streaming Expression statistical function library. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilcoxon_signed-rank_test

Implementation provided by Apache Commons Math.

comments.content: Move issue from deprecated 'In  Progress' back to 'Open'
comments.author: Gavin
